description: Whole roasted eggplant makes an impressive vegetarian centrepiece dish.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Lemon,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Whole Roast Eggplant with Chickpeas & Tahini Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Place the eggplants on a baking tray and rub all over with olive oil. Roast for 40 minutes, turning a couple of times.

In a large bowl, toss the chickpeas, one clove of garlic, garam masala and lemon zest together with a tablespoon of oil. Pour the chickpeas onto the baking tray with the eggplants and roast for 20 minutes more, shaking halfway through.
Whisk the yoghurt, tahini and lemon juice together in a small bowl and stir in the rest of the garlic.
Serve each eggplant with crispy chickpeas piled on top and a drizzle of tahini yoghurt.
